text: Chris was known to be a lesbian in my company. She is pretty and cool, short hair, always dressed like a Tomboy in office. some guys tried to woe her but always got rejected coldly. I learned from her closed friend that Chris had a traumatic relationship with his boyfriend in high school, and since then became a lesbian.As a boss, I don't usually interfere my staff's personal life, as long as they deliver the performance. But to say I am not attracted by her pretty face then I am hypocrite. I sometimes feel that it is really a waste that a pretty lady like her has to be a lesbian. The future prospect and the well-being of a staff is somewhat a responsibility of employer. For this, I made a business trip with Chris to Penang for a prospect customer meeting.We checked in Shangri-La's Rasa Sayang Resort & Spa Hotel. In one night I asked her to bar downstairs to talk her heart out, asked her about the personal life. She shocked by my direct frankness, yet she told me everything. Then she cried and told me she is lonely, and wanted a normal woman life. That night, she really needed a companion....After the business trip, Chris is much happier and friendly to everybody. Staff told me she is no longer a lesbian, and appeared to start a normal relationship with a guy. As a boss, I am glad I managed to work for extra mile for my staff to lead them to a better life. Chris still came to look for me once in a while, to show her gratitude to me for my help to her normal life. All the best, Chris.
Grats TS for turning some girls life around.
